name: RunLoop
desc: The programmatic interface to objects that manage input sources.

items.name: current
items.desc: Returns the run loop for the current thread.

items.name: limitDate
items.desc: Performs one pass through the run loop in the specified mode and returns the date at which the next timer is scheduled to fire.

items.name: main
items.desc: Returns the run loop of the main thread.

items.name: getCFRunLoop
items.desc: Returns the receiver's underlying CFRunLoop object.

items.name: add
items.desc: Registers a given timer with a given input mode.

items.name: add
items.desc: Adds a port as an input source to the specified mode of the run loop.

items.name: remove
items.desc: Removes a port from the specified input mode of the run loop.

items.name: run
items.desc: Puts the receiver into a permanent loop, during which time it processes data from all attached input sources.

items.name: run
items.desc: Runs the loop once, blocking for input in the specified mode until a given date.

items.name: run
items.desc: Runs the loop until the specified date, during which time it processes data from all attached input sources.

items.name: acceptInput
items.desc: Runs the loop once or until the specified date, accepting input only for the specified mode.

items.name: perform
items.desc: Schedules the sending of a message on the receiver.

items.name: cancelPerform
items.desc: Cancels the sending of a previously scheduled message.

items.name: cancelPerformSelectors
items.desc: Cancels all outstanding ordered performs scheduled with a given target.

items.name: minimumTolerance
items.desc: The minimum tolerance allowed by the run loop scheduler.

items.name: now
items.desc: The run loop schedulerâ€™s definition of the current moment in time.
